  • Method Details

    • getWon

      @GetMapping("/won") public String getWon(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      GET request for the main page after winning. Displays the score achieved by the winner, and a form to enter the player name.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • postWinnerName

      @PostMapping("/winners") public String postWinnerName(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @Valid @Valid WinnerDetails winnerDetails)
      POST request for saving the winner's name and score. Checks if the name already exists in the repository before saving.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      winnerDetails - the winner details to be saved
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • getFirst5Winners

      @GetMapping("/winners") public String getFirst5Winners(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      GET request for displaying the first 5 winners sorted by score.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • getAllWinnersNames

      @GetMapping("/admin/winners") public String getAllWinnersNames(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      GET request for displaying all winners' names. This endpoint is accessible to admin only.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • postDeleteTable

      @PostMapping("/admin/deleteTable") public String postDeleteTable(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      POST request for deleting all winners' records from the repository. This endpoint is accessible to admin only.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • postDeletePlayer

      @PostMapping("/admin/deletePlayer") public String postDeletePlayer(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam("playerName") Long playerName)
      POST request for deleting a specific player's record from the repository. This endpoint is accessible to admin only.
      Parameters:
      model - the model object for the view
      playerName - the ID of the player to be deleted
      Returns:
      the name of the view to render

    • handleNotFoundException

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException.class) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleNotFoundException(org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException ex)
      Exception handler method to handle the ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException. Renders the error view with an error message.
      Parameters:
      ex - The NotFoundException thrown
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object representing the error view
